ygData.subject: RE: Searching for wreckage
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep go for it... It s a great idea IMO.  Verant says the stuff is out there... there s really no point in everyone going over the same spots in our searches,
ygData.messageBody:
Yep go for it... It's a great idea IMO. Verant says the stuff is out
there... there's really no point in everyone going over the same spots in
our searches, just makes getting the answers we need take longer.

Darkadvent - Cazic-Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: ALEX SHIMANOVSKY [mailto:10815@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 19, 2000 12:31 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Searching for wreckage


From: ALEX SHIMANOVSKY <10815@...>

What I might do is make a site dedicated to Tinker Research. I have some
web space. here are some key ideas

- make a map of OOT, let people download it . search an area of it, Shade
the area they have searched, Sumbit it back to me. I will then shade the
area on a MASTER copy, that way over time we will widen up a seach in oot.

- Make a section about Tattred Gnomish Cloak, Failed Combos.
- Make a section about the searching of the Diamond Dust.

- BTW crushed Dufrinte does not work I tried it.

What do you all Thing ? Should I do it ?
